allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Complete rental system with admin dashboard and C# integration

## Laravel Backend
- Add AdminRentalController with full rental management
  - User rental CRUD, extend, suspend, reactivate
  - Manual rental creation for gifts/promotions
  - Refund processing and completion
  - Package management (CRUD, toggle active)
  - Revenue reports and analytics dashboard
- Add usage tracking middleware and API
  - CheckActiveRental middleware
  - CheckRentalLimits middleware for posts, AI, brands, platforms
  - InternalApiAuth middleware for C# Core communication
  - UsageTrackingController for cross-service usage updates
- Add scheduled tasks (Artisan commands)
  - ProcessExpiredRentals: auto-expire rentals
  - SendRentalExpiryReminders: 3-day, 1-day, same-day reminders
  - CancelStalePendingPayments: cleanup old pending payments
- Add email notifications
  - RentalActivatedNotification
  - RentalExpiredNotification
  - RentalExpiringNotification
  - PaymentConfirmedNotification
  - UsageLimitWarningNotification (80%, 90%, 100%)
- Add UsageLog model for tracking usage history
- Update Payment model with refund support
- Update UserRental model with usage fields
- Update RentalPackage model with getDurationInDays()
- Add new migrations for usage_logs and payment refunds
- Add account creation system (PhoneNumber, EmailAccount, ProxyServer)
- Add web learning workflow models

## C# AI Manager Core
- Add PlatformSetupService for platform initialization
- Add AccountPoolManager for social account rotation
- Add OllamaServiceManager, OllamaChatService, OllamaCpuOptimizer
- Add SystemResourceDetector for hardware detection
- Update ContentGeneratorService and ImageGeneratorService
- Add new UI pages: ChatPage, ImageGeneratorPage, ModelManagerPage
- Add FuturisticStyles.xaml for modern UI theming
- Update AIProvidersPage and PlatformsPage

## Version
- Bump version to 1.1.0

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(gh pr create --title "feat: Complete rental system with admin dashboard and C# integration" --body "$(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- Complete Laravel backend rental system with admin dashboard API
- Add usage tracking and limit enforcement middleware
- Add scheduled tasks for rental lifecycle management
- Add email notifications for rental events
- Add C# AI Manager enhancements (Ollama, platforms, UI)

## Changes

### Laravel Backend
- **AdminRentalController**: Full rental management (CRUD, extend, suspend, refund, packages, reports)
- **Middleware**: CheckActiveRental, CheckRentalLimits, InternalApiAuth
- **UsageTrackingController**: API for C# Core to track usage
- **Artisan Commands**: ProcessExpiredRentals, SendRentalExpiryReminders, CancelStalePendingPayments
- **Notifications**: Rental activated/expired/expiring, Payment confirmed, Usage limit warnings
- **Models**: UsageLog, updated Payment/UserRental/RentalPackage
- **Migrations**: usage_logs table, payment refund columns

### C# AI Manager Core
- **Services**: PlatformSetupService, AccountPoolManager, OllamaServiceManager, OllamaChatService
- **UI**: ChatPage, ImageGeneratorPage, ModelManagerPage, FuturisticStyles

## Test plan
- [ ] Run Laravel tests: `php artisan test`
- [ ] Build C# solution: `dotnet build`
- [ ] Verify admin API endpoints work correctly
- [ ] Test rental limit middleware
- [ ] Test scheduled commands manually

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add MyPostXAgent WPF desktop application with RGB Premium UI

Complete WPF application for social media management:

Pages:
- DashboardPage - Overview with stats and recent posts
- AccountsPage - Social account management (Facebook, IG, TikTok, Twitter, LINE)
- PostsPage - Create and manage posts with CRUD operations
- SchedulerPage - Calendar-based post scheduling
- ContentGeneratorPage - AI content generation (Ollama, OpenAI, Claude, Gemini)
- SettingsPage - API keys configuration for AI providers

Features:
- RGB Premium gaming theme with firefly background effects
- MVVM architecture with BaseViewModel and RelayCommand
- SQLite database with Dapper for data persistence
- License/Demo system with machine ID verification
- Material Design UI components
- Full Thai language support

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add complete AI Content Generation system to MyPostXAgent

Implemented comprehensive AI-powered content generation with multi-provider 
support, auto-fallback, and Thai language optimization.

**AI Providers:**
- Ollama (Free, Local) - llama3.2
- Google Gemini (Free tier) - gemini-2.0-flash-exp
- OpenAI GPT (Paid) - gpt-4o-mini
- Anthropic Claude (Paid) - claude-3-5-haiku

**Features:**
- Multi-provider content generation with auto-fallback
- Thai language support with optimized prompts
- Hashtag generation based on keywords
- Platform-aware content (FB/IG/TikTok/Twitter/LINE)
- Provider status monitoring in MainViewModel
- Settings page integration with auto-reinitialize
- Built-in prompt templates (10 categories)
- Error handling and user-friendly messages

**New Files:**
Core/Models:
- AIModels.cs - Request/Result models
- PromptTemplate.cs - 10+ built-in templates

Core/Services/AI:
- IAIContentGenerator.cs - Provider interface
- OllamaContentGenerator.cs - Local AI
- OpenAIContentGenerator.cs - GPT integration
- ClaudeContentGenerator.cs - Claude integration
- GeminiContentGenerator.cs - Gemini integration
- AIContentService.cs - Main service with fallback

Documentation:
- AI_INTEGRATION.md - Complete usage guide

**Updated Files:**
- App.xaml.cs - Register AIContentService
- ContentGeneratorViewModel.cs - Real AI integration
- SettingsViewModel.cs - Reinitialize on save
- MainViewModel.cs - AI status monitoring
- Enums.cs - Updated AIProvider enum

**Build Status:**
‚úÖ Build succeeded (0 warnings, 0 errors)

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: Remove rental/license system - migrate to xmanstudio

Remove the following components as PostXAgent will now use
xmanstudio''s license system instead:

- Models: Invoice, License, Payment, PaymentOrder, PromoCode,
  RentalPackage, SmsPayment, UsageLog, UserRental
- Controllers: AdminRentalController, LicenseController,
  PaymentGatewayController, RentalController, UsageTrackingController
- Middleware: CheckActiveRental, CheckRentalLimits
- Commands: CancelStalePendingPayments, ProcessExpiredRentals,
  SendRentalExpiryReminders
- Services: RentalService, ThaiPaymentService
- Migrations and related database files

See: https://github.com/xjanova/xmanstudio

)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add GPU Node Monitor page with smart scheduling

- Add GpuNodeModels.cs with status enums (12 states with color codes)
- Add GpuNodeMonitorService for smart node management:
  - Real-time status tracking for all GPU nodes
  - 5 selection strategies (Sequential, MaxQuota, FastestStart, SmartBalance, RoundRobin)
  - Auto-prestart next node before current expires
  - Emergency node activation when disconnected
  - Quota and session time tracking
- Add GpuNodeMonitorPage UI with:
  - Stats cards (Total, Running, Error, Quota)
  - Active node card with progress bars
  - Next node preview with switch countdown
  - Node list with color-coded status indicators
  - Event log for monitoring actions
  - Filter and sort functionality
  - Pulse animation for blinking states
- Register GpuNodeMonitor in MainWindow navigation
- Update ColabGpuModels.cs with additional provider types

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Resolve overlapping panels in WebLearning page

Fixed the issue where AI Command Prompt and AI Response Panel were
overlapping when Auto Learning mode was enabled.

Changes:
- Wrapped AI Prompt Input and AI Response Panel in a StackPanel
- Both panels now display vertically stacked instead of overlapping
- AI Response Panel appears below the prompt input when visible
- Increased MaxHeight of response text from 120 to 150 for better readability

The panels are now properly laid out:
1. AI Prompt Input (always visible when Auto Learning is on)
2. AI Response Panel (appears below after sending a prompt)

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
